---
title: "Untitled"
format: svg
---

<!-- Quick Learning Analytics — outline letters; Q with wider bars; new colors (Q=red, L=blue, A=yellow) -->
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="1000" height="300" viewBox="0 0 1000 300" role="img" aria-label="Quick Learning Analytics logo">
  <title>Quick Learning Analytics</title>
  <desc>Outline-only Q, L, A with updated colors (Q=red, L=blue, A=yellow). Q contains three wider bars with smaller gaps.</desc>
  <defs>
    <style>
      /* New color palette from reference image */
      .qStroke { stroke:#FF1E1E; }   /* red */
      .lStroke { stroke:#1440FF; }   /* blue */
      .aStroke { stroke:#F2C200; }   /* yellow */

      /* Wordmark colors mapped to Q, L, A */
      .qColor { fill:#FF1E1E; }
      .lColor { fill:#1440FF; }
      .aColor { fill:#F2C200; }

      /* Shared wordmark typography */
      .textBase {
        font-family: Inter, Poppins, system-ui, -apple-system, "Segoe UI", Arial, sans-serif;
        font-weight: 800;
        font-size: 70px;
        letter-spacing: -0.01em;
      }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <!-- Symbol block -->
  <g transform="translate(28,26)" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
    <!-- Q: red ring with tail (outline only) -->
    <circle cx="110" cy="110" r="78" class="qStroke" stroke-width="14"/>
    <path d="M160 160 L184 184" class="qStroke" stroke-width="14"/>

    <!-- Bar chart inside Q (wider bars, smaller gaps). Left→right: red, blue, yellow -->
    <!-- Increased stroke-width from 10 -> 16 and tightened centers (92,112,132) -->
    <line x1="92"  y1="170" x2="92"  y2="128" class="qStroke" stroke-width="16"/>
    <line x1="112" y1="170" x2="112" y2="114" class="lStroke" stroke-width="16"/>
    <line x1="132" y1="170" x2="132" y2="98"  class="aStroke" stroke-width="16"/>

    <!-- L: blue right angle (outline) -->
    <path d="M192 68 L192 178 L240 178" class="lStroke" stroke-width="18"/>

    <!-- A: yellow outline with crossbar -->
    <path d="M250 178 L272 92 L294 178" class="aStroke" stroke-width="14"/>
    <line x1="258" y1="138" x2="286" y2="138" class="aStroke" stroke-width="10"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Wordmark (stacked) with matching colors; reduced gap between lines -->
  <g transform="translate(360,120)">
    <text class="textBase">
      <tspan class="qColor">Quick</tspan>
      <tspan> </tspan>
      <tspan class="lColor">Learning</tspan>
    </text>
  </g>
  <g transform="translate(360,184)">
    <text class="textBase aColor">Analytics</text>
  </g>
</svg>
